column3: Rebased 4b49ed65ede769617eab048e4bbab6d5219600c6 -> e8ce6a4877186940e95e67aeaa12fd11a23b1e0d ([getbalance-cleanup.0](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/getbalance-cleanup.0) -> [getbalance-cleanup.1](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/getbalance-cleanup.1)), fixing trivial merge conflict with #9613.\n

Rebased e8ce6a4877186940e95e67aeaa12fd11a23b1e0d -> be74f34671ac89feaafe80b3ac43ff108c9ceb29 ([getbalance-cleanup.1](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/getbalance-cleanup.1) -> [getbalance-cleanup.2](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/getbalance-cleanup.2)) because of conflict with #9764.

Rebased be74f34671ac89feaafe80b3ac43ff108c9ceb29 -> 0b9520d1fb242864b8bd3f6ec68fa91b231467df ([pr/getbalance-cleanup.2](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/getbalance-cleanup.2) -> [pr/getbalance-cleanup.3](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/getbalance-cleanup.3)) because of conflicts with pwalletMain renames in #9775.\n

No problem, thanks for the review!\n\nRebased 0b9520d1fb242864b8bd3f6ec68fa91b231467df -> 02d9f50d5f3c96fe888c230d59c5afdab4c7c6a3 ([pr/getbalance-cleanup.3](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/getbalance-cleanup.3) -> [pr/getbalance-cleanup.4](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/commits/pr/getbalance-cleanup.4)). No changes except adding another `std::` prefix and passing the right

I think this results in no longer throwing `RPC_WALLET_INVALID_ACCOUNT_NAME` when someone tries to get balance of `"*"`, instead, it returns back the total balance. But I think this is what we want....
Yes, this is just keeping the current behavior (line 698 before this commit, which is removed in the next commit).
